actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to dispose of 35,000 long tons of tin in the national and supplemental stockpiles, and to provide for the deposit of moneys received from the sale of such tin.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to dispose of approximately 35,000 long tons of tin presently held in the national and supplemental stockpiles. Stipulates that moneys received pursuant to such disposition shall be covered into a special fund in the Treasury.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to dispose of 35,000 long tons of tin in the national and supplemental stockpiles, and to provide for the deposit of moneys received from the sale of such tin.
